snippet: Plaintiffs' lawyers have begun scouring General Motors Co's report on its handling of faulty ignition switches that have been tied to 13 deaths and say they are finding details that could bolster their negligence cases....

headline.print_headline: Lawyers Scan GM Report for Details to Bolster Negligence Suits
headline.main: Lawyers Scan GM Report for Details to Bolster Negligence Suits

lead_paragraph: Plaintiffs' lawyers have begun scouring General Motors Co's report on its handling of faulty ignition switches that have been tied to 13 deaths and say they are finding details that could bolster their negligence cases.
